channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Egypt to host emergency Arab summit to discuss Palestinian developments
item.description: A statement by the Egyptian foreign ministry said the leaders will gather on Feb. 27 amid alarm in the region over President Trump's proposals regarding the future of Gaza.
item.content:encoded:
A statement by the Egyptian foreign ministry said the leaders will gather on Feb. 27 amid alarm in the region over President Trump's proposals regarding the future of Gaza.

(Image credit: Youssef Alzanoun)
item.dc:creator: Jerome Socolovsky

item.title: Super Bowl 2025: The Kansas City Chiefs take on the Philadelphia Eagles in New Orleans
item.description: The Kansas City Chiefs meet the Philadelphia Eagles Sunday for a date with history. The chiefs are trying to become the first NFL team ever to win three Super Bowls in a row.
item.content:encoded:
The Kansas City Chiefs meet the Philadelphia Eagles Sunday for a date with history. The chiefs are trying to become the first NFL team ever to win three Super Bowls in a row.

(Image credit: Jamie Squire)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: The EEOC exists to fight discrimination. Fired official fears a hobbling under Trump
item.description: Jocelyn Samuels was Trump's pick in 2020 to fill a Democratic seat on the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission. She was fired in January, accused of embracing "radical" ideology.
item.content:encoded: Jocelyn Samuels was Trump's pick in 2020 to fill a Democratic seat on the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission. She was fired in January, accused of embracing "radical" ideology.
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hsu

item.title: Europe's far-right leaders applaud Trump and downplay threat of possible U.S. tariffs
item.description: The event was organized by Spain's Vox party in Madrid under the banner "Make Europe Great Again." The leaders applauded President Trump's agenda and spoke of the turning point it presented Europe.
item.content:encoded:
The event was organized by Spain's Vox party in Madrid under the banner "Make Europe Great Again." The leaders applauded President Trump's agenda and spoke of the turning point it presented Europe.

(Image credit: Paul White)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Sam Nujoma, Namibia's fiery freedom fighter and first president, dies aged 95
item.description: Sam Nujoma, the freedom fighter who led Namibia to independence from apartheid South Africa in 1990 and served as its first president for 15 years, has died. He was 95.
item.content:encoded:
Sam Nujoma, the freedom fighter who led Namibia to independence from apartheid South Africa in 1990 and served as its first president for 15 years, has died. He was 95.

(Image credit: Themba Hadebe)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: A Stradivarius violin sells for $11.3 million at auction, falling short of record
item.description: The violin, made over 300 years ago by a legendary luthier, had been expected to sell for a higher price. The proceeds will go toward a scholarship program at the New England Conservatory.
item.content:encoded:
The violin, made over 300 years ago by a legendary luthier, had been expected to sell for a higher price. The proceeds will go toward a scholarship program at the New England Conservatory.

(Image credit: Angela Weiss)
item.dc:creator: James Doubek

item.title: It's not all fur and games. Here's how the Puppy Bowl works
item.description: The Puppy Bowl may look like lawless fun. But there are rules to the annual competition, now in its 21st year. Here's what to know as Team Ruff and Team Fluff hit the turf on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
The Puppy Bowl may look like lawless fun. But there are rules to the annual competition, now in its 21st year. Here's what to know as Team Ruff and Team Fluff hit the turf on Sunday.

(Image credit: Ryan Muir)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: What to know about presidents and security clearances
item.description: Both former President Joe Biden and President Trump have barred their predecessor access to classified information. But historically, it wasn't like that.
item.content:encoded:
Both former President Joe Biden and President Trump have barred their predecessor access to classified information. But historically, it wasn't like that.

(Image credit: Anna Rose Layden)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Here are 3 takeaways from Trump's plans to name himself chairman of Kennedy Center
item.description: President Trump plans to fire several Board Members at Washington D.C.'s John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and indicated that he's naming himself chairman. Here's why it matters.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump plans to fire several Board Members at Washington D.C.'s John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and indicated that he's naming himself chairman. Here's why it matters.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello

item.title: Buffy Sainte-Marie stripped of prestigious Canadian honor
item.description: The Canadian government did not share its reasons for the decision, but it follows an investigation that shed doubt on the Oscar-winning singer's claims of Indigenous roots.
item.content:encoded:
The Canadian government did not share its reasons for the decision, but it follows an investigation that shed doubt on the Oscar-winning singer's claims of Indigenous roots.

(Image credit: Mark Zaleski)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman
